page.title: 09OTHER SHOPPING
page.content: Most people in Ashwell and Newnham do their main shopping outside the survey block. People tend to go to {supermarkets, hypermarkets or {furniture warehouses}in bigger towns, buying enough groceries to last for several weeks or taking advantage of lower prices. Many people{travel 30-40 miles}to get to the big shopping centres where they can buy clothes,jewellery,shoes etc. They do this because there is{more {choice}and because it is often cheaper.People told us thay they go to Cambridge, Bedford, Stevenage,Luton,or Peterborough for such shopping.Some go to London. On one of our survey days a delivery van from Harrods, the top London store, called at one of the farmhouses in Ashwell. For this kind of choice you need good transport ad good wages!!
